title: Allow Edge to print background colors
body: Add an option to Edge similar to the "Print Background Colors and Images" option in IE 11. The use of background colors can enhance layouts and make data more readable, such as on reports or calendars. This would still give the user the option to not allow background colors to print while giving the developer maximum flexibility.
